[h1]for Loops[/h1]

You can have any type of condition and any type of increment statements in the for loop.
The example below prints only the even values between 0 and 10: [code format="java" codeId="741"][b]for[/b](int x=0; x<=10; x=x+2) {
  System.out.println(x);
}
/*
0
2
4
6
8
10
*/[/code]
[note]A [b]for [/b]loop is best when the starting and ending numbers are known.[/note]
